text:
Win10 Pro desktop now running Win10 Pro 22H2 successfully updated through Jan.
2024 
WinRE partition size 1 GB(1024 MB) – created using a DiskPart script when clean
installing Windows 10 Pro 21H1 in August 2021 
WinRE partition located adjacent and immediately after the Windows o/s
partition(C: drive) 
Before successful 22H2 Jan 2024 Update 
* WinRE Partition - 785 MB used space, 239 MB free space 
After successful 22H2 Jan 2024 Update 
* WinRE Partition – 801 MB used space, 223 MB free space 
Should it have failed the update, since there was less than the **required 250
MB** free space? 
Maybe…239 MB was close enough or the 250 MB requirement is a number with a
built-in buffer. 
Fortunately(or apparently) this WinRE free space issue isn’t impacting Windows
11 23H2 
* My Win11 Pro device also has a 1024 MB WinRE partition
 * Before the Jan. 2024 update the WinRE partition was 818 MB used space, 206 MB
 free
 * After the successful Jan 2024 update the WinRE partition is 829 MB, 195 MB
 free space 
…w

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft

Sent: January 12, 2024 4:09 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft 
THE JANUARY 2024 WINDOWS RE UPDATE MIGHT FAIL TO INSTALL 
STATUS 
Confirmed

WI706430
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadmin.microsoft.com%2FAdminportal%2FHome%3Fsource%3Dapplauncher%23%2Fwindowsreleasehealth%2F%3A%2Fissue%2FWI706430&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cbcdcc3482a1b4683345b08dc14842698%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638407805020013374%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Hbza0O%2Fn%2BfiFdokmpEqs80Ep2Do2N1ekRk%2FgOKQQ7ns%3D&reserved=0] 
KB5034441
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fhelp%2F5034441&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cbcdcc3482a1b4683345b08dc14842698%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638407805020013374%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=MuHKWB6W%2F6o9qVaIhCzfT3zhckZ65o%2BuwzvVWZ%2FLh%2BY%3D&reserved=0] 
- 
Devices attempting to install the January 2024 Windows Recovery Environment
update (the Originating KBs listed above) might display an error related to the
size of the Recovery Environment's partition. The Windows Recovery Environment
(WinRE)
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fwindows-hardware%2Fmanufacture%2Fdesktop%2Fwindows-recovery-environment--windows-re--technical-reference%3Fview%3Dwindows-11&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cbcdcc3482a1b4683345b08dc14842698%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638407805020013374%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=NEYpmThNgD6vrcvvw2%2BJFbbOrYd5onAhzube5Da%2FvNs%3D&reserved=0]
is used to repair or recover from issues affecting Windows. 
Resulting from this error, the following message might be displayed. 
* "0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE" 
Workaround: It might be necessary to increase the size of the WinRE partition in
order to avoid this issue and complete the installation. Note that 250 megabytes
of free space is required in the recovery partition. Guidance to change the
WinRE partition size can be found in KB5028997: Instructions to manually resize
your partition to install the WinRE update
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fhelp%2F5028997&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cbcdcc3482a1b4683345b08dc14842698%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638407805020013374%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=oQk9njmUtzsl%2BWuXO3ZtBZIUmvairTI1Av5vgKtD19A%3D&reserved=0]. 
Next steps: We are working on a resolution and will provide an update in an
upcoming release.
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CH3PR10MB7331543D30DF3B16007EC5E39E6E2%40CH3PR10MB7331.namprd10.prod.outlook.com
